section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: MediumOfPerformance sampleBibs: - 655800 fieldSpec: - 382ans trimPunctuation: false scriptInclusion: NONE

step.cmd: Process the medium of performance values (MARC 382ans).

chdesc.p:
For each 382an pair, join the following values with a whitespace character:
Number of
382a
performers:
382n + .

For 382s following one or more 382an pairs, join the following values to the 382an value(s) with a whitespace character:
Total number of performers:
382s + .

stepresult.note: This example is meant to illustrate a medium of performance statement and does not represent a complete JSON-LD document.
